project.create.title: Project Name
project.create.address.placeholder: Enter an address and verify, or click a location on the map
project.create.address.hint: Accurate address is not required, the address is only used for generating weather data
project.error.invalid-address.googlemap: Google Map cannot verify the address
project.optimal.title: Optimal Orientation
project.title: Setup PV System
project.add.combibox_cable_len: Cable length (AC combiner box to meter)
project.add.combibox_cable_avg_len: Avg cable length (AC combiner box to transformer/power cabinet)
project.spec.tilt_angle.hint: Angle between module and the ground
project.spec.optional.tooltip: Warning: Autogen will overwrite the current inverter settings
project.spec.celltemp_a.help: Empirically-determined coefficient establishing the upper limit for module temperature at low wind speeds and high solar irradiance
project.spec.celltemp_b.help: Empirically-determined coefficient establishing the rate at which module temperature drops as wind speed increases
project.spec.celltemp_dtc.help: Temperature difference between cell and module back
project.spec.celltemp_uv.help: Combined heat loss factor influenced by wind
project.spec.panels_per_string: Number of PV modules in series
project.spec.ac_cable_len.hint: Cable length from the inverter to the combiner box
project.spec.ac_cable_avg_len.hint: Average cable length from each inverter to a combiner box
project.spec.dc_cable_len.hint: Cable length from each string to the inverter, seprated by comma (i.e. 20,25,30)
project.spec.dc_cable_avg_len.hint: Average cable length from each string to the inverter
project.spec.dc_cable_len.error.only-num: Cannot enter element other than number
project.spec.dc_cable_len.error.spi-not-: Entered values does not match the number of parallel strings
project.autoInverter.too-small.detail: The DC capacity is too small for the selected inverter, consider increasing the DC capacity or selecting a smaller inverter
project.autoInverter.no-fit: Module does not fit into this inverter, select another module or inverter
project.autoInverter.title: Optimal Inverter Settings
